discussion.p: The chrono-spec grammar introduced by P1361R2 "Integration of chrono with text formatting" in section [time.format] is ambiguous because '%' can be interpreted as either literal-char or conversion-spec:

blockquote.pre: chrono-spec ::= literal-char | conversion-spec literal-char ::= <a character other than '{' or '}'> conversion-spec ::= '%' [modifier] type

discussion.p: Status to Tentatively Ready and priority to 0 after five positive votes on the reflector.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4830.
